version_description:
Greet the first blooms of spring with the new Blossom update! It includes performance and stability improvements for better plant care and identification experience.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey! Here is another update for all plant lovers:
- Meet the "Explore" section with thematic plant collections: Best Indoor Plants for Clean Air, 8 Colorful Houseplants for the Bedroom, and more!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey! Here is another update for all plant lovers:
- New plant collections in the "Explore" section;
- Now you can upload several photos of a plant for easier identification.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey! Here is another update for all plant lovers:
It includes performance and stability improvements for better plant care and identification experience.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

Hey! Here is another update for all plant lovers:
It includes performance and stability improvements for better plant care and identification experience.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hey there, plant family!

Meet the redesigned "Explore" section where you can find:
- "Useful Tips" with plant care and gardening advice;
- "Plant Сollections" to help you choose the perfect plant;
- "Inspiration" for falling in love with new green friends.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hey there, plant family!

Meet the redesigned "Explore" section where you can find:
- "Useful Tips" with plant care and gardening advice;
- "Plant Сollections" to help you choose the perfect plant;
- "Inspiration" for falling in love with new green friends.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family!

Not sure when to water your plants? No worries!
In the latest update, we’ve added pre-set water reminders for 100 popular plants and are planning to add more. Keep your plants healthy and hydrated with us!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family!

Here is another update for all plant lovers:
We’ve added a “Plant of the Week” series to the Explore tab where you can get to know new plants every week and learn how to care for them. Get your portion of plantspiration with Blossom!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family!

We've improved our search algorithm so that you can find care tips and information about your plants much easier.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family! Here’s what’s new in this update:

- My Notes: write notes and upload photos of your plants to track their growth and development.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hey! Here is another update for all plant lovers:
It includes performance and stability improvements for better plant care and identification experience.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family! Let’s start the winter season with a jolly mood and better plant care experience:

- Plant profiles redesign: we’ve redesigned and improved plant profiles to make your plant care experience even easier and more visually appealing;
- New article: check out our new article “How to repot a plant” to know all the dos and don’ts of repotting your green friends.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Ho-ho-ho, plant family!
Christmas spirit is already in the air! Get your portion of PLANTspiration and enjoy even smoother plant care experience in the latest version of Blossom. Let it grow!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family! 
Looking for a new plant to grow? Blossom is here to help you! Now you can use filters in Search to find a perfect green friend based on light requirements, care difficulty level, plant type, and more. 

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hooray, plant family! The long-awaited update with overdue reminders is finally here!

- Missed a notification to water your plants? No worries! Check your plants in My Garden or open the full list of reminders to see if there are any overdue ones.

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.

Hi there, plant family!

You asked for it, and we did it! Now you can change a profile picture of your plant in just a couple of clicks: take a snap of your green friend or upload a photo to the profile from the gallery – and you’re done!

Thank you for your continued support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@conceptivapps.com.
